projects.subtitle: WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT & DESIGN
projects.title: DEEDEVELOPER.COM
projects.content: Deedeveloper.com is a well-crafted, professional freelance development platform that highlights the skills and services of mine. This website acts as a freelancer's website including  interactive portfolio, presenting my projects, personal profile, and available services. It includes a blog with full CRUD (create, read, update, delete) operations, allowing users to comment with similar CRUD functionality. The site also features a testimonial section where users can write reviews and add comments, both with full CRUD capabilities. In addition, there's a quote form where users can submit their email, name, and message, along with a login system offering full registration, password reset, email authentication, and CAPTCHA verification. A FAQ accordion answers common questions, and a contact form is provided that pre-fills information for logged-in users, simplifying message submission. The blog and feedback system make it easy to communicate and engage with potential clients.

projects.title: WAGEFIGURER
projects.content: WageFigurer is a mobile application designed for cabbies, by allowing them to easily calculate and save mileage records, expenses, and net-paying reports.
